restructured_question: Check Materials (MATNR) in MARA_500 table. If matching entries found, then bring Base Unit of Measure (MEINS) field from MARA_500 table to the Target Table. ELSE, If no entries found in MARA_500, then check ROH Material (found in Transformation 2 ) in MARA_700 Table and bring the Unit of Measure. ELSE, If no entries found in MARA_700, then bring the Unit of measure from MARA table

transformation_history.description: Populated PRODUCT with MATNR values where MTART = 'ROH'
Get Base Unit of Measure (MEINS) from MARA_500, MARA_700 or MARA table based on Material Number (MATNR)
